questions.text: What drink is being served on Peter's boat in the beginning of the episode?
questions.explanation:
Punch.

	In the beginning, Peter and his neighbours are having a party on the boat, and his shipmates, Santos and Pasqual, are serving everyone during the festivities.  During the party, Brian gets drunk, and Stewie ends up golfing.

questions.text: What does Quagmire do on Peter's boat?
questions.explanation:
He fishes.

	Quagmire ends up catching a fish, and when he pulls it out of the water, it accidentally goes down Loretta's shirt.  Soon after, everyone decides to play Charades.

questions.text: Who nearly drowns in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Joe.

	While playing the game on the boat, Joe falls over the edge, and since he's paraplegic, he can't swim.  Santos and Pasqual pull Joe back onto the boat and give him CPR.  Lois and Peter decide to take a lesson about CPR.

questions.text: Who is the first to discover that Loretta is cheating on Cleveland?
questions.explanation:
Peter.

	After Brian hears Loretta screaming, he and Peter decide to run over and find out what's wrong.  When they arrive, they decide not to tell Cleveland.  Eventually, Peter tells everyone but Cleveland.

questions.text: What feature helped Brian and Peter discover that Quagmire was sleeping with Loretta?
questions.explanation:
A tattoo.

	When Peter and Brian discover that Quagmire was the assailant, they decide to tell Cleveland, and he is forced to stay with the Griffins for a while.

	This is discovered when Loretta kicks Cleveland out of the house.  Cleveland ends up bottling up his anger and he lets it out when Peter tries to re-enact the affair.

questions.text: What is the name of Chris' cousin?
questions.explanation:
Jeanine.

	Peter and Chris decide to make fun of the fact that Jeanine is diabetic.  They decided to laugh because she had a reaction after she ate caramel.

questions.text: Who helps to protect Quagmire when Cleveland tries to kill him?
questions.explanation:
Mayor West.

	Peter thinks that Mayor West's house is the last place that Cleveland would look for Quagmire, so he takes him there.  Mayor West ends up trying to stay up all night next to Cleveland's bed, but his plan falls through.

questions.text: What item is given to Quagmire to protect himself from Cleveland?
questions.explanation:
A banana.

	Mayor West says to use the banana when he thinks that the time is right.  Quagmire ends up throwing it at Cleveland when he's being chased, but it doesn't do anything.

questions.text: Loretta and Cleveland patch things up in the end of the episode.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Actually, the exact opposite happens.  Cleveland and Loretta decide to split up because Cleveland decides that he deserves better and Loretta decides she wants more passion in her life.  In the end, Cleveland and Quagmire end up remaining friends.
